reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 505/10: MONITORS FOR NON-GOVERNMENTAL REGULATORY AUTHORITIES
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 505/10: MONITORS FOR NON-GOVERNMENTAL REGULATORY AUTHORITIES

content.content:
1. The Ministers listed in Column 3 of the Table are appointed as monitors for the non-governmental regulatory authorities listed in Column 2 opposite their titles. O. Reg. 505/10, s. 1. Table   Monitors for Non-Governmental Regulatory Authorities Column 1 Item   Column 2 Ontario Regulatory Authority   Column 3 Monitor 

  1.   Association of Architectural Technologists of Ontario   Attorney General 

  2.   Association of Chartered Industrial Designers of Ontario   Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  3.   Association of Municipal Clerks and Treasurers of Ontario   Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  4.   Association of Ontario Road Supervisors   Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  5.   Association of the Chemical Profession of Ontario   Minister of the Environment and Climate Change 

  6.   Association of Translators and Interpreters of Ontario   Attorney General 

  7.   Institute of Certified Management Consultants of Ontario    Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  8.   Institute of Municipal Assessors   Minister of Finance 

  9.   Municipal Law Enforcement Officers’ Association (Ontario) Inc.   Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  10.   Ontario Association of Certified Engineering Technicians and Technologists   Attorney General 

  11.   Ontario Association of Home Inspectors   Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  12.   Ontario Association of Property Standards Officers   Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  13.   Ontario Association of Veterinary Technicians   Minister of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs 

  14.   Ontario Building Officials Association   Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  15.   Ontario Home Economics Association    Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  16.   Ontario Institute of Professional Agrologists   Minister of Agriculture, Food and Rural Affairs 

  17.   Ontario Institute of the Purchasing Management Association of Canada Inc.   Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  18.   Ontario Municipal Management Institute    Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  19.   Ontario Professional Planners Institute   Minister of Municipal Affairs 

  20.   The Association of Registered Graphic Designers of Ontario   Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  21.   The Association of Registered Interior Designers of Ontario    Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  22.   The Chartered Institute of Marketing Management of Ontario    Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  23.   The Institute of Chartered Secretaries and Administrators in Ontario    Minister of Advanced Education and Skills Development 

  24.   The Ontario Association of Landscape Architects   Attorney General 

  25.   The Ontario Registered Music Teachers’ Association    Minister of Education O. Reg. 101/17, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation). O. Reg. 505/10, s. 2.
